body:
Hey, I created a new intro for my pvp montages, please could I have some feedback? Thanks :)
Linkity Link Link:  http://youtu.be/U-E-MS8OtSo

Thanks :D

title: New PVP Montages Intro! (Need feedback)

replies.body: It was kinda long and the subtitles were hard to see. Honestly, I like simpler intros with a little animation, but that's just me I guess.
replies.body_tagged: It was kinda long and the subtitles were hard to see. Honestly, I like simpler intros with a little animation, but that's just me I guess.

replies.body: sorta a long intro, we all know you can get kills :P but i really like the music and the beginning of the intro! :)
replies.body_tagged: sorta a long intro, we all know you can get kills :P but i really like the music and the beginning of the intro! :)

replies.body: Looks pretty good, but yeah I agree with the other two, too long!
replies.body_tagged: Looks pretty good, but yeah I agree with the other two, too long!
